props.name: children
props.docblock: Specifies the content of the `Overlay`.

description.text: Specifies the content of the `Overlay`.

props.name: container
props.docblock:
A component instance, DOM node, or function that returns either.
The overlay will be positioned in relation to the target.

description.text:
A component instance, DOM node, or function that returns either.
The overlay will be positioned in relation to the target.

props.name: onEnter
props.docblock: Callback fired before the `Overlay` transitions in.

description.text: Callback fired before the `Overlay` transitions in.

props.name: onEntered
props.docblock: Callback fired after the `Overlay` finishes transitioning in.

description.text: Callback fired after the `Overlay` finishes transitioning in.

props.name: onEntering
props.docblock: Callback fired as the `Overlay` begins to transition in.

description.text: Callback fired as the `Overlay` begins to transition in.

props.name: onExit
props.docblock: Callback fired right before the `Overlay` transitions out

description.text: Callback fired right before the `Overlay` transitions out

props.name: onExited
props.docblock: Callback fired after the `Overlay` finishes transitioning out.

description.text: Callback fired after the `Overlay` finishes transitioning out.

props.name: onExiting
props.docblock: Callback fired as the Overlay begins to transition out.

description.text: Callback fired as the Overlay begins to transition out.

props.name: onHide
props.docblock:
A callback invoked by the overlay when it wishes to be hidden.
Required if `rootClose` is specified.

description.text:
A callback invoked by the overlay when it wishes to be hidden.
Required if `rootClose` is specified.

props.name: placement
props.docblock: The placement of the `Overlay` in relation to it's target.

description.text: The placement of the `Overlay` in relation to it's target.

props.name: popperConfig
props.docblock: A set of popper options and props passed directly to `Popper`.

description.text: A set of popper options and props passed directly to `Popper`.

props.name: rootClose
props.docblock: Specify whether the overlay should trigger `onHide` when the user clicks outside the overlay.

description.text: Specify whether the overlay should trigger `onHide` when the user clicks outside the overlay.

props.name: rootCloseEvent
props.docblock: Specify event for triggering a “root close” toggle.

description.text: Specify event for triggering a “root close” toggle.

props.name: show
props.docblock: Set the visibility of the `Overlay`.

description.text: Set the visibility of the `Overlay`.

props.name: target
props.docblock:
The visibility of the `Overlay`. `show` is a controlled prop so should
be paired with `onToggle` to avoid breaking user interactions.

Manually toggling show does not wait for delay to change the visibility.

Controls `onToggle`.

description.text:
The visibility of the `Overlay`. `show` is a controlled prop so should
be paired with `onToggle` to avoid breaking user interactions.

Manually toggling show does not wait for delay to change the visibility.

Controls `onToggle`.

props.name: transition
props.docblock:
Animate the entering and exiting of the Overlay. `true` will use the `<Fade>` transition,
or a custom react-transition-group `<Transition>` component can be provided.

description.text:
Animate the entering and exiting of the Overlay. `true` will use the `<Fade>` transition,
or a custom react-transition-group `<Transition>` component can be provided.

props.name: children
props.docblock: Specifies the content of the `OverlayTrigger`.

description.text: Specifies the content of the `OverlayTrigger`.

props.name: overlay
props.docblock: An element or text to overlay next to the target.

description.text: An element or text to overlay next to the target.

props.name: defaultShow
props.docblock: The initial visibility state of the `Overlay`.

description.text: The initial visibility state of the `Overlay`.

props.name: delay
props.docblock: A millisecond delay amount to show and hide the `Overlay` once triggered.

description.text: A millisecond delay amount to show and hide the `Overlay` once triggered.

props.name: flip
props.docblock: The initial flip state of the `Overlay`.

description.text: The initial flip state of the `Overlay`.

props.name: onToggle
props.docblock:
A callback that fires when the user triggers a change in tooltip visibility.
`onToggle` is called with the desired next show, and generally should be
passed back to the `show` prop. `onToggle` fires after the configured `delay`.

Controls `show`.

description.text:
A callback that fires when the user triggers a change in tooltip visibility.
`onToggle` is called with the desired next show, and generally should be
passed back to the `show` prop. `onToggle` fires after the configured `delay`.

Controls `show`.

props.name: placement
props.docblock: The placement of the `Overlay` in relation to it's target.

description.text: The placement of the `Overlay` in relation to it's target.

props.name: popperConfig
props.docblock: A `Popper.js` config object passed to the the underlying popper instance.

description.text: A `Popper.js` config object passed to the the underlying popper instance.

props.name: show
props.docblock:
The visibility of the `Overlay`. `show` is a controlled prop so should
be paired with `onToggle` to avoid breaking user interactions.

Manually toggling show does not wait for delay to change the visibility.

Controls `onToggle`.

description.text:
The visibility of the `Overlay`. `show` is a controlled prop so should
be paired with `onToggle` to avoid breaking user interactions.

Manually toggling show does not wait for delay to change the visibility.

Controls `onToggle`.

props.name: trigger
props.docblock: Specify which action or actions trigger `Overlay` visibility.

description.text: Specify which action or actions trigger `Overlay` visibility.
